# defaultAttributes

**Instance Property**

The dictionary of default attributes that the system applies, during pasting or dropping, to plaintext strings from an item provider.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var defaultAttributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any] { get }
```
